The discovery of a 2000 year-old, unopened tomb housing a skeleton surrounded by modern day video equipment sends a young archeologist on the adventure of a lifetime in director Sebastian Niemann's religious-themed thriller. A discovery of this magnitude has never been recorded in the realms of modern-day archeology, and when the young adventurer becomes convinced that the skeleton is actually the remains of a futuristic time traveler who had once ventured back into the past, his quest to solve the perplexing mystery leads him into the realms of humanity's most guarded secrets. With concrete proof of the existence of Jesus Christ at hand, mankind may finally be on the verge of an earth-shaking revelation. 
                                                            ~ Jason Buchanan, Rovi
